overview: Aditya (Yosi Mokalu) is dissatisfied with his life because it doesn't match with his dream. His relationship with his wife, Maya (Rachel Maryam), is full of arguments about small and big things. He always fantasizes if he didn't get married with Maya, then his life would be better. His wish is granted. He is given a chance to change his past to make a better present. He changes one moment in his youth that makes everything turn out to be different.
title: Medley
